overview: The short film, A play for Public which is going to be a part of the graduation exhibition, is a poetic 25 minutes film meditating on the struggles of modern thought through the persona of a poet who is reflecting and responding to situations from three perspectives: a body, place and time. In this project, essentially, she has studied the contradictory and confusing situations that humans are experiencing as individuals in Neoliberal urban life.
title: A Play For Public
